about_the_game:
One winter night you find yourself being relentlessly pursued by a blood-thirsty murderer. You stumble upon a shadowy hedge maze and dash inside, thinking it might be your ticket to safety, but the killer is not deterred by the maze's labyrinthine twists and turns, and eagerly follows you in.

Your only way out is to go back the way you came in, but the killer lurks between you and freedom, and every step you take creates a trail that leads him straight to you.

Create multiple trails to confuse and mislead the pursuing murderer. Use snowshoes to hide your tracks and hedge clippers to carve new paths through the maze. Will you outsmart the killer, or will you become another victim in the haunting snowscape?

The nightmare begins now.

Your only way out is to go back the way you came in, but the killer lurks between you and freedom, and every step you take creates a trail that leads him straight to you.

Create multiple trails to confuse and mislead the pursuing murderer. Use snowshoes to hide your tracks and hedge clippers to carve new paths through the maze. Will you outsmart the killer, or will you become another victim in the haunting snowscape?

The nightmare begins now.
name: Deadly Footprints

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 and above
  • Processor: 1.2Ghz+
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 256MB
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

short_description: Deadly Footprints is a top-down 2d horror game about being chased through a maze by a deranged killer who is following your footprints in the snow. How can you escape the killer when every step you take brings him closer to you?
